page.title: 20IRCHESTER/WHITEFRIARS SCHLS.
page.content: The material for this project was com- piled with the help of children,staff and parents from Irchester and White- friars (Rushden) Junior Schools. Irchester Junior School. 257 children aged between 7 and 11 at- tend the school.There are 11 full time members of staff,10 class teachers and the headmaster. There are many after school activities the children can join.The school is within walking dis- tance of Irchester Country Park,so it is used extensively for field study. Whitefriars Junior School(Rushden). The school caters for 233 pupils.The catchment area is mainly private hous- ing from which come enthusiastic chil- dren and parents.10 members of staff teach a 2 form entry and provide re- sources for gifted & remedial child- ren.Extra-curricular activities have produced success in music,art & games.
